August 13, 1962
Mr* William 0* Harley, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bills
Thank you for your letter and for the photostats of
Ed Browned comments *
X agree wholeheartedly with all of Ed’s suggestions
-just about everything he mentions points up the necessity
for employing a full-time PE director assigned to NAE8 Head¬
quarters. There are mway things I know Should be done for
NAEB, and as PE Chairman, I am constantly frustrated because
my primary responsibilities here at the Museum have to come
first* There is never enough remaining time to do the PR
job that should be done for NAEB.
Maybe this situation can be Improved in the future
planning of NAKB's growth.
All the best,
MGida
Marion Cornell, Manager
Educational Television
